com.facebook.buck.apple

Class IosPostprocessResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.shell.Genrule
        • com.facebook.buck.apple.IosPostprocessResources
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, BuildRule, Comparable<HasBuildTarget>

    public class IosPostprocessResources
extends Genrule
    Runs a shell script after the 'copy resources' build step has run.

    Example rule: 

     ios_postprocess_resources(
   name = 'pngcrush',
   cmd = '../Tools/pngcrush.sh',
 )

    This class is a hack and in the long-term should be replaced with a rule which operates similarly to apk_genrule, or should be removed entirely if possible. It will be necessary to replace or remove this when we begin building iOS binaries with buck.
